trends: There has been one other sighting in Newport
There were no other sightings in Newport on or around August 27th 2005
Summary: A round ufo flying about the same height of a small plane, it slipped behind a tree and never re appeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy grandson and I were having lunch on the porch of the Richards Libary during their apple pie festival. He was seated facing me, and I was seated facing the street and the common. I was looking for clouds since it was hot and was wondering rain would be comming. I noticed a round flying object in the sky. At first I thought it was a hoover disk, but it appeared to be too far up in the sky. It went out of my sight, behind a tree (The common is lined with trees) and I waited for it to come out the other side, but it disapeared. It was dark, dark, gray, almost black and I did not hear any sound. I kept looking up for it to reapear and looked for anyone on the common that may have seen the object, but everyone was going about their business as usual. I felt like I had seen something special and couldn't share it with anyone. Prior to reporting this tonight, I looked to see if there were any other sigthings that day. I did not find any, but did find some sightings about an hour away from our home, but the objects were completely different.
